For example, we use a third-party service for ad tracking and to help us prepare website and mobile application analytics.
We will share some of the information we collect from you with vendors and other service providers who work with us to support the internal operations of our website and/or mobile application.
Our third-party ad tracking and analytics company never sends emails, notifications, or other communications to our end users.

Please consult the terms and conditions and privacy policies of those third party websites and microsites to find out how they collect and use Your personal data and to establish whether and for what purpose they use cookies.
Third Party Sites and Contributors 7.1 The Games may contain links to websites and microsites that are operated by third parties.
We do not control those websites and microsites and as such this Privacy Policy does not apply to those websites and microsites.
